description: Multiplicative order of 11 mod n, where GCD(n, 11) = 1.
mathematica: MultiplicativeOrder[11, #] & /@ Select[ Range@ 90, GCD[11, #] == 1 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 05 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for(n=1, nn, if (gcd(n, 11) == 1, print1(znorder(Mod(11, n)), ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 09 2015
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 20 2000
